author: bayard
msg: Splitting the Infrastructure specific items out of the dev/index page. This provides the foundation on which to build a page specific to the services and offerings from the Infrastructure team, and a page or pages that are focused on the foundations requirements and guidance for committers/pmcs. It's going to require much more tweaking, but this is a first step. Navbar will be updated in the next commit
